pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pip3-autoremove* This repository based on https://github.com/tresni/pip-autoremove and https://github.com/invl/pip-autoremove . *Remove a package and its unused dependencies.Supports both Python2 and Python3.## How to install* How to install pip3-autoremove for Python3:```sudo pip3 install python3-pip-autoremove```* How to install pip3-autoremove for Python2:```sudo pip install python3-pip-autoremove```## Usage```pip3-autoremove packages-to-uninstall```To remove the globally installed package, add "sudo" before the pip3-autoremove command.
